title: Container: Generic scaffold
description: Adds a generic Dockerfile scaffold without pinning a base image or hardcoding tool installs.

with.text:
# Choose a base image according to your environment policy
FROM <choose-base-image>

WORKDIR /app

# Copy source
COPY . /app

# Build/run steps are intentionally not hardcoded here.
# Use your environment settings to decide tool installs and commands.

EXPOSE 8080
CMD ["<choose-entrypoint>"]
